goals.active: Attack the cultist-led bandit camp and defeat the White Mantle.
goals.complete: With the help of Captain Thackeray, Exemplars Salia and Mehid, and a group of brave Seraph, we raided the cultist-led camp and destroyed the White Mantle. Afterwards, Salia and Mehid told me they may've found my parents' last place of residence. They're coming with me to investigate.
